var.name: seconds
var.desc: (Seconds) Number of seconds elapsed since 1970-01-01 00:00:00 UTC

var.name: nanoSeconds
var.desc: (Nanoseconds) Current nanoseconds

bit.name: Pri_ActiveCab
bit.desc: (Active Cab) Primary ATP Active

bit.name: Pri_ATPType
bit.desc: (Unit Type) Indicates which redundant ATC this is. 1:Primary 2:Secondary

bit.name: Pri_Controlling
bit.desc: (This ATC in Control) Indicates that this ATC is available to control the train. 0: Inactive 1: Active

bit.name: Pri_RedunSysAvail
bit.desc: (This ATC Operational)Indicates the availability of the other ATC system. 0: Unavailable 1: Available

bit.name: Pri_AbsoluteVzero
bit.desc: (Absolute Vzero) Indicates that the train is at the no motion state. 0: Inactive 1: Active

bit.name: Pri_TrainVzero
bit.desc: (Train Vzero) Indicates that the speed is < 1.5 mph. 0: Inactive 1: Active

bit.name: Pri_EB_BrakeActive
bit.desc: (EB Request) Indicates that the ATP has asserted the Emergency Brake. 0: EB applied 1: EB not applied

bit.name: Pri_FullServiceBrakeRequest
bit.desc: (Full Service Brake) Indicates that the ATC is applying the FSB. 0: Inactive 1: Active

bit.name: Pri_OverSpeedStatus
bit.desc: (Over Speed Active) Indicates that the train is over speed. 0: under 1: over

bit.name: Pri_SignalingPresent
bit.desc: (Signaling Present) Indicates ATP is receiving wayside speed codes 0: No Signaling 1: Signaling present

bit.name: Pri_ATP_CutTraction
bit.desc: (ATP Tract Cut) Indicates that the traction cut signal is active. 0: Inactive 1: Active

bit.name: Pri_DoorCloseReq
bit.desc: (Door Close Req) Indicates that the door close request is active. 0: Inactive 1: Active

bit.name: Pri_PAOvrRide
bit.desc: (Override PA mode) Indicates that PA mode has been manually over ridden. 0: inactive 1:active

bit.name: Pri_PAOvrRideRejected
bit.desc: (Override of PA Rej) Indicates an attempt was made to manually over ride PA mode, but it was rejected. 0: inactive 1:active

bit.name: Pri_TXBuzzerOn
bit.desc: (TX Buzzer on) Sound the Buzzer in the Other ATC 0: inactive 1:active

var.name: Pri_DepSpdCodeHldUpTmr
var.desc: (Dep Speed Code Holdup Timer) Departure speed code hold up timer. Decreases from 20 to 0.

bit.name: Pri_MstCtrlDirection
bit.desc: (MC Direction) Direction from the master controller. 0: Invalid, 1: Neutral, 2: Forward, 3: Reverse

bit.name: Pri_MstCtrlDeadmanSts
bit.desc: (MC DeadMan) State of the master controller deadman switch. 0: Inactive 1: Active

bit.name: Pri_MstCtrlQuadrant
bit.desc: (MC Position) Overall Position of the master-controller. 0: Off 1: Brake 2: Coast 3: Traction

var.name: Pri_CntlMode
var.desc: (ATP Mode) ATP operating mode. 0: Off 1: CMC 2: ATO 3: CM 4: CD 5: TA 7: PA Override

var.name: Pri_DADepartureTime
var.desc: (DA Depart Time) DA Departure button press time, in seconds. Range: 2-10

var.name: Pri_sparebyte02
var.desc: (IC Test Speed) Inverter Cut Test speed, in mph. Range: 23, 28, 33

var.name: Pri_EnforcedSpeedLimit
var.desc: (Enf Speed Limit) Enforced speed limit as a value. range: 0, 10, 15, 20, 25, 35, 45

var.name: Pri_TrainSpeed
var.desc: (Train Speed) The current train speed in 0.1 MPH

var.name: Pri_TrainSpeed6840
var.desc: (Tach2 Ch2D Speed) The speed from Tach2 Channel 2D in 0.1 MPH

var.name: Pri_TrainSpeed6522
var.desc: (Tach1 Ch1C Speed) The speed from Tach1 Channel 1C in 0.1 MPH

bit.name: Pri_TachDirection
bit.desc: (Tach Direction) Direction from the tachs via the MFB 0: unknown 1: Forward 2: Reverse 3: Bad

var.name: Pri_ESLCode
var.desc: (Enforced Speed Limit Code) Speed limit currently enforced as an enumeration 0: Invalid 1: No code 2: F0 3:Invalid 4: F10 5: F15s 6: F15 7: F20 8: F25 9: F35 10: F45

var.name: Pri_InitMotionChkTime
var.desc: (Init Motion time) Time the initial motion check has been running. 0-8 seconds

var.name: Pri_DecelValueFwd
var.desc: (Decel Fwd Value) Raw decelerometer reading in the Forward Direction.

var.name: Pri_DecelValueRev
var.desc: (Decel Rev Value) Raw decelerometer reading in the Reverse Direction.

var.name: Pri_AccelDecelRate
var.desc: (Decel Rate) The current deceleration rate in 0.01 Meter/sec^2

var.name: Pri_BrakeRateBank
var.desc: (Brake Rate Bank) The current braking rate banked value in m/s^2

bit.name: Pri_BrakeAssuranceMet
bit.desc: (Brake Assurance) Brake Assurance Status 0 = Met 1 = Not Met

bit.name: Pri_DecelCalibrated
bit.desc: (Decel Calibrated) Decelerometer Calibration Status 1= Calibrated 0 = Not Calibrated

bit.name: Pri_EBFeedback
bit.desc: (EB feedback) Status that the EB has been applied 0: EB Off 1:EB On

bit.name: Pri_TractEnable
bit.desc: (Tract Enable) Traction enable status. 0: cut, 1:Enabled

var.name: Pri_Tachdvdt
var.desc: (tach dv/dt) acceleration computed from speed range -2 to 2

var.name: Pri_SpareByte04
var.desc: (SB 4) Unused

var.name: Pri_SpeedLimitCode
var.desc: (Spd Limit Code) The current speed code from the Wayside. 0: NO_CODE 1: F0s 2: F0 3: Fvd 4: F10 5: F15s 6: F15 7: F20 8: F25 9: F35 10: F45

var.name: Pri_SpeedCodePeriod
var.desc: (Speed Code Per) The period of the last received speed code in 0.0001 seconds.

bit.name: Pri_SpeedCodeDetected
bit.desc: (Speed Code Det) Indicates the presence of a speed code. 0 = code missing 1 = code present

bit.name: Pri_StationSigDet
bit.desc: (Station Sig Det) Indicates the presence of a station carrier signal 0 = Absent 1 = Present

bit.desc: (Mod 4 Khz) Indicates the presence of modulated station carrier signal. 0: no signal 1: steady 4Khz 2: 45Hz Moduation 3: 35Hz Modulation

bit.name: Pri_CoastBeaconDetected
bit.desc: (Coast Beacon) Indicates the detection of a coasting beacon. 0 = Absent 1 = Present

bit.name: Pri_TrkCirBoundDetect
bit.desc: (Track Circuit Bound) Indicates the presence of a track circuit boundary. 0 = Absent 1 = Present

bit.name: Pri_SStopBeacon1Det
bit.desc: (Stop Beacon 1) Station stop beacon 1 detected. 0: Absent 1: Present

bit.name: Pri_SStopBeacon2Det
bit.desc: (Stop Beacon 2) Station stop beacon 2 detected. 0: Absent 1: Present

bit.name: Pri_SStopBeacon3Det
bit.desc: (Stop Beacon 3) Station stop beacon 3 detected. 0: Absent 1: Present

bit.name: Pri_OpStopBea1Det
bit.desc: (OP Beacon 1) Operational stop beacon 1 detected. 0: Absent 1: Present

bit.name: Pri_OpStopBea2Det
bit.desc: (OP Beacon 2) Operational stop beacon 2 detected. 0: Absent 1: Present

bit.name: Pri_CSRD1_HealthStatus
bit.desc: (CSRD 1 Health) CSRD CPU 1 Health Status. 0: OK 1: Informational Event 2: Warning Event 3: Failure Event

bit.name: Pri_CSRD2_HealthStatus
bit.desc: (CSRD 2 Health) CSRD CPU 2 Health Status. 0: OK 1: Informational Event 2: Warning Event 3: Failure Event

var.name: Pri_PwireEffort
var.desc: (PWire Current) The P-wire current (Effort request) in 0.1 mA

var.name: Pri_ATODistanceToStop

bit.desc: (Station Stop) Indication that the ATO is performing a station stop 0: not SS 1: SS

bit.name: Pri_ATO_SkipStationStopAllowed
bit.desc: (ATO Skip Stat Stop All) ATP Skip Station Stop Allowed 0: Not Allowed, 1: Allowed

bit.name: Pri_ATOOperational
bit.desc: (ATO Operational) ATO operational status 0: not operating 1: operating

bit.name: Pri_ATOCoastInd
bit.desc: (ATO Coast) ATO in coast 0: no 1: yes

bit.name: Pri_ATOTractInd
bit.desc: (ATO Traction) ATO in traction 0: no 1: yes

bit.name: Pri_DAButtonSts
bit.desc: (DA Button) Automatic departure button status. 0: OFF 1: ON

bit.name: Pri_ProgStopInd
bit.desc: (Prg Stop Ind) Program stop indication. 0= no program stop underway, 1 either POS or PSS underway

bit.name: Pri_ATOBrakeInd
bit.desc: (ATO Brake) ATO is requesting brakes. 0: no Brakes, 1: Brake Request

bit.name: Pri_CancelStationStopInd
bit.desc: (ATO Skip Stat Stop Act) ATO Skip Station Stop Active 0: Not Active, 1: Active

bit.name: Pri_DepartureInd
bit.desc: (ATO Departure Ind) The ATO will depart the station 0: Not Departing, 1: Departing

bit.name: Pri_ATO_SkipStationStopIgnored
bit.desc: (Skip Station Stop Ignored) ATP Skip Station Stop Ignored 0: Not Ignored, 1: Ignored

var.name: Pri_SpareByte05
var.desc: (SB 5) Unused

var.name: Pri_DepartDistanceFromStation
var.desc: (ATP Depart Distance) The Stop in Station Enable distance from the station in cm

bit.name: Pri_CanStopInStation
bit.desc: (Can Stop In Stat) Indication that the train can stop inside the station. 0: Not Stop inside station 1: Stop Inside station

var.name: Pri_ATOspeed
var.desc: (ATO speed) ATP speed in m/s. (0- 30)

bit.name: Pri_CSRD_SelfTestResult
bit.desc: (CSRD Test Res) Indicates the results of CSRD's self test. 0: no result 1: test passed 2: test failed

bit.name: Pri_spareTestResult
bit.desc: (ST spare) unused

bit.name: Pri_ATO_SelfTestResult
bit.desc: (ATO Test) Indicates the results of ATO's self test. 0: no result 1: test passed 2: test failed

bit.name: Pri_QVM_SelfTestResult
bit.desc: (QVM Test) Indicates the results of QVM's self test. 0: no result 1: test passed 2: test failed

bit.name: Pri_ATPSelfTestStatus
bit.desc: (ATP Test Status) the status of a self test | N/A, running, Complete

var.name: Pri_InvCutTestState
var.desc: (Inv Cut Test State) state of the inverter cut test. 0: initial, 1: test running, 2: pass, 3: fail

var.name: Pri_TractCutTestState
var.desc: (Tract Cut Test State) state of the traction cut test. 0: initial, 1: test running, 2: pass, 3: test aborted, 4: test failed

var.name: Pri_InvCutTestRes
var.desc: (Inv Cut Test Res) Inverter cut test results. 0: initial, 2: pass, 3: fail

var.name: Pri_TractCutTestRes
var.desc: (Tract Cut Test Res) Traction cut test results. 0: initial, 2: pass, 3: test aborted, 4: test failed

var.desc: (Tract Cut Tst Aborts) Count of aborted traction cut test. 0-255.
